features: 👍【Touch Control & 3-Color Modes】 TOBUSA LED desk lamp adopted with sensitive one button touch control, satisfying all your lighting needs! Simply tap your finger to turn On/OFF the light and change the color mode as you will. Hassle-free to find twist switch in totally darkness! 3000K warm white ideal for relax. 4000K natural white good for reading. 5000K daylight white ideal for office work. Non-flickering lighting makes it a friendly desk lamp&a considerate gift for your families, friends.

👍【Stepless Dimmable & Energy Saving】 Equipped with fully dimming brightness, our touch desk lamp give out endless lighting possibilities by long pressing the button. Choose your optimum lighting whether warm or white, bright or low. Embedded with advanced LED beads, this dimmable LED desk lamp enable to save extra 90% energy than traditional incandescent filaments. Hence a long-life span of 20000-hours remove your worry of exchanging expenditures. Lowest your consumption, save your dollars!

👍【Excellent Adjustable Design&Exquisite Golden Finish】 This flexible desk lamp combines with 90°moving head & 360° swing arm, which enable the light cover all your reading, playing, working zone with neither buzz or flicker lighting. Fold-able architect design makes the maximum use in your space. Moreover, high-quality gold brass finishing bring you a durable & easy-maintain reading light. No worries of getting rusty or corrosion. DIY your vintage desk lamp and light up all your ambient.

👍【Practical USB Charging Port & Industrial Decor】 Add our retro desk lamp in your gift list! With a light, our lamp accompany you in stepless brightness and meet all your needs. A 5V/2.1A USB charging station will be ready no matter the lamp is On/OFF. Providing energy for devices such as kindle, Ipad, MP3, phones. Greeting the morning with full power devices! With no light, our vintage dimmable lamp is an elegant decor match perfectly in your bedroom, office, living room, reading room.

👍【Eye Protection & No Assembling Needed】This vintage gold desk lamp equipped with superior LED beads which gives out soft, flicker-free, no buzz lighting for more than 25000+ hours. Hence there’s no replacement needed for it. Besides, zero step to get your reading lamp once received! Put it on your bedside nightstand, reading desk, living room table right away without any troublesome procedures!

Adjustable Design: DIY your own lamp dimension with rota-able head and swing arm. Multiple Lighting Choice: Stepless dimmable and 3-color modes display countless lighting possibilities and meet all your needs. Practical Charging Port: Useful charging station for small devices such as phone, kindle, radio, headphone. Lightly press to change your favorite mode. Long press to adjust eye-caring brightness. Equipped with highly decorative brass metal finish, this drafting lamp would catch your eyes for the first sight. Extraordinary vintage decor in your space!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Attractive and Functional
reviews.reviewText: These lamps are so pretty and help pull together two separate work areas on one table. I have a third lamp in my bedroom. I love the adjustable touch control with three brightness shades and the ability to adjust the lamps to different heights and angles. The finish and overall design is beautiful. HOWEVER, the two lamps recently ordered were received on 2/19/2023. Today is 5/5/2023 and one of the lamps is no longer functioning properly- the light is very dim. Apparently we cannot exchange the bulbs as these are meant to last for a very long time. I don't know how to go about returning it since it is beyond the Amazon return period. I'd simply like a replacement. Now I'm stuck.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice looking and practical lamp
reviews.reviewText: Just what we needed for night stand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Bed Side Light, But Joints Wont Tighten Enough by Hand to Keep it from Drooping.
reviews.reviewText: I really like this as a bedside lamp, and it's so easy to turn off and on when lying in bed and just touching the activation pad. The swivel joints dont lock very well because the short handles dont allow one to tighten the joint very well when just using the hand so that the lamp can droop from its desired setting. A pair of pliers are needed to adequately tighten the joint. The soft light is perfect for a ready lamp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Neck not tight, doesn’t always stay in place
reviews.reviewText: It’s a cute nightstand light, the neck is kind of flimsy and it doesn’t always stay in the place you want it to, the lights dim and have 3 different options, I am satisfied. I change my furniture occasionally so these are good for now. I think I’m could find better

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I shopped for the perfect desk lamp for a long time. I hesitated purchasing this lamp because the light is not replaceable, but it had all the features I wanted: dimmable with several touch settings, USB charging port, adjustable, and sturdy.I love it! When the bulb needs replacing I will just buy another lamp. It is reasonably priced.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The perfect lamp, except for the base and the switch and...
reviews.reviewText: I've got a few problems with this lamp:- Base is too light: if you position the light too far from the base, it falls over. So you can't put the base at the edge of the desk and pull the light to the center of the workspace, something I think an "architect light" should do.- Light at end of arm can be positioned downward 90 degrees, but not up.- the Switch: One touch to turn light on, but THREE touches to turn light off?Pictured: Added 280 grams to base. Helps, but needs more. Re-attached light rotated 180 degrees

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Looks very modern and on trend. Great quality and highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This lamp I love but it is getting dimmer to the point it barley lights up. It states over 2000 - 2500 hours of use. Nope I bought this maybe 2 months ago ! Sad because I loved this . Plus I think it’s past return date 😩
Para el lavabo para rasurarse mi esposo
